biotools.summary: iTaxoTools is a tool suite for integrative taxonomy. The suite contains tools to compute pairwise DNA distances, ultrametric time trees based on non-parametric rate smoothing, species-diagnostic nucleotide positions, and standard morphometric analyses. Other utilities convert among different formats of molecular sequences, geographical coordinates, and units; merge, split and prune sequence files and tables; and perform simple statistical tests.
